text: José Enrique Serrano (born October 24, 1943) is an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from 1990 until 2021. Serrano is a Democrat from New York. He is not running for re-election in 2020 due to a diagnosis of Parkinson's disease. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman José E. Serrano official U.S. House site * * *Profile at SourceWatch *Rep. title: José E. Serrano
